Title: Establishes the commission for the modernization and revitalization of downstate medical center
Summary: Establishes the commission for the modernization and revitalization of downstate medical center; implements the recommendations of such commission.
LawCode: Add Art 49-C ยง996, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing the commission for the modernization and revitalization of downstate medical center
